sect1.title: Tag
sect1.para: This filter offers users a selection of "tags". In Ondex, some concepts can get tagged by parsers and/or transformers. It is then possible to look at all the concepts that have been annotated with the same tag. The left column allows users to select tags whilst the right one allows them to select an operation ("OR", "AND", "NOT") to combine tags, should several tags get selected in the left column.
